currentDoc: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. I

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.

The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.

The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens

When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the

When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand.

When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interesty

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them th

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.

They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the po

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans.

Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaini

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain contro

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control and get

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them.

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so hal

The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand.

When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other halve

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans.

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half.

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.

The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half.

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half the populatio

 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their p

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand.

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until neithe

 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewher

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wan

 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to complet

The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely giv

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a comp[

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them.

They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.

They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force.  However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a compromise. They agree that they will altern

Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.

They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half.

 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a compromise. They agree that they will alternate between being each others slaves. H

 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a compromise. They agree that they will alternate between being each others slaves. Humans are the sl

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a compromise. They agree that they will alternate between being each others slaves. Humans are the slaves for three day

 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a compromise. They agree that they will alternate between being each others slaves. Humans are the slaves for three days, then the aliens. I

 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a compromise. They agree that they will alternate between being each others slaves. Humans are the slaves for three days, then the aliens. It's something the f

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left.

They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a compromise. They agree that they will alternate between being each others slaves. Humans are the slaves for three days, then the aliens. It's something the few remain

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left.

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
 This has to stop somewhere. Neither side wants to completely give in so they try to figure out a compromise. They agree that they will alternate between being each others slaves. Humans are the slaves for three days, then the aliens. It's crazy enough t

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again. It was the power to be able to control aliens! 
The survivors are able to harness this power and fight back against the aliens.
 However, most decided just to have fun with it instead. They begin turning the aliens into their slaves. The aliens are forced to do all of the work, while the humans sit back and relax. They mow the yard, cook the meals and even are the drivers for humans. 
The aliens are not too happy about this.
 They themselves realize they have their own mana that works in a similar way. It would give them the power to control humans, overriding the humans mana powers. They begin to search for a way to harness their own mana. They eventually realize that they need to kill many of their own kind so that the survivors have a stronger mana force. Half of the aliens end up volunteering and overnight, the aliens now have the upper hand. 

The aliens begin getting their revenge. They force the humans to do all of the work, while they sit back and relax. They aren't interested in killing the humans anymore. They now just want to put them through the same punishments and humiliate them. 
The humans are not happy about this.
 They need to get the power back. They begin searching for a way to harness their mana again. They then come to the same conclusion as the aliens. They need to wipe out half of the remaining humans to regain control with their mana. The humans aren't eager to volunteer so half of the humans end up killing the other half. 

This continues back and forth. One side takes control and then the other wipes out half of their population until both sides have hardly anyone left. 
The aliens and humans are now at a stalemate.
